page.title: 20ABBOTSKERSWELL COUNCILLOR
page.content: Mr Eales is a past chairman of the Parish Council.He helped to build the Village Hall and has built 14 to 16 houses in the village. He has been a parish councillor for 17 years. When we asked him what he thought of the village he said he would like to go back 25 years and build the village again because houses were built on the skyline and it makes the village look unattractive. The parish council for this area, called Kerswells Parish Council covered both Kingskerswell and Abbotskerswell.In Spring 1984 the two parish councils came into being, one for each village. Looking to the future Mr.Eales said that there were many faciities he would like in the village. These included a bowling green and some tennis courts.
